subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 16 of his 30 points in a critical third quarter, as Miami took Game 5 over Indiana to move within a victory of its third straight N.B.A. finals.
snippet: LeBron James scored 16 of his 30 points in a critical third quarter, as Miami took Game 5 over Indiana to move within a victory of its third straight N.B.A. finals.
